R

removeMultiViewDescription(MultiViewDescription) - Method in class org.netbeans.core.api.multiview.MultiViewHandler
Removes multiview element that was added at runtime.
requestActive(MultiViewPerspective) - Method in class org.netbeans.core.api.multiview.MultiViewHandler
Requests focus for the MultiViewPerspective passed as parameter, if necessary will switch from previously selected MultiViewPerspective
requestActive() - Method in class org.netbeans.core.spi.multiview.MultiViewElementCallback
Activates this multi view element in enclosing multi view component context, if enclosing multi view top component is opened.
requestVisible(MultiViewPerspective) - Method in class org.netbeans.core.api.multiview.MultiViewHandler
Changes the visible MultiViewPerspective to the one passed as parameter.
requestVisible() - Method in class org.netbeans.core.spi.multiview.MultiViewElementCallback
Selects this multi view element in enclosing component context, if component is opened, but does not activate it unless enclosing component is in active mode already.
resolveCloseOperation(CloseOperationState[]) - Method in interface org.netbeans.core.spi.multiview.CloseOperationHandler
Perform the closeOperation on the opened elements in the multiview topcomponent.
